title: Blood Borne
description: An Alien war has engulfed Earth and Twenty First century reality is profoundly altered.  On the day Isaac receives his call-up papers a beautiful girl walks into his electrical repair shop but a bombing raid ends all chances of normality.  Forced into hiding by a demon army, Isaac and Chloe discover the origins of evil but also a possible escape from their enemiesâ€™ toxic grip.  Armed with powerful and much desired secrets the couple begin to fight back against the traitor Oswald.  Able to trust no one but each other they negotiate the terrifying traps set up to defeat them in order to decide in which time and space their secrets belong.
author: Elizabeth Wixley
